title: Saints.Row.IV.Repack.R.G.Revenants

Saints Row IV
Year: 2013
Publication Type: RePack [Repack]
Tablet: enclosing (RELOADED)
Language: English / French / German / Italian / Spanish

Description:

Stilport - a giant virtual "sandbox" in which everything is possible - superpowers, unimaginable transport and an arsenal of weapons of extraterrestrial! Enjoy the endless possibilities of the President and show its citizens that capable of a true leader of the Saints. In Saints Row IV Saints head was elected president of the United States. But this is only the beginning! And now, with nothing comparable, inflamed catastrophic alien invasion, the madness of Saints Row series has made a new round - the aliens
abandoned the Saints in a virtual model of their hometown Stilport. Master the supernormal grand scale and pry humanity from alien grandfather's mental acumen Zinyaka. Escape from the virtual trap that caught the Saints or die trying. Saints Row IV throws the player into the abyss of alien technology and weapons
that will make every Saint in the face of ultimate destruction. Apply your alien superpowers to punch their way to the top. The advanced features and advanced customization, the player can jump off a building to building, overtaking fast sports cars, to send enemies flying power of telekinesis. All this and more
in the most reckless of Saints Row!

GAME FEATURES:

The American Dream - the story covers the whole country, the space and time! Saints Row IV

compared to Saints Row: The Third is like Saints Row: The Third, compared with the movie
"Do the Right Thing!" This game can not prepare.

Supreme Commander of the superhero - jump over the building, kill the people with the power of
thought, pass through tanks like a knife through butter. And this is the most peaceful abilities,
which will be accessible!

Alien dangerous toys - use (for research purposes), an impressive array of alien weapons and vehicles.

Customise weapons of custom madness - you customize the look of your character, you set up his clothes.
Now you can complete your way through a new set of weapons. Turn the ordinary to the exotic gun barrels.

The destructive duo - a free connection to the co-op mode, the standard for Saints Row,
just got better! The only thing that could be cooler than the evil President with supernormal,
the two superpowers of the President of evil!
